text: Ani uniharupachi yasta manisaharu uniharuko tha'um ogate, jo kitabaka uttaradhikari bha'i yasa sansarako sampatti linchan, ra bhanchanh ‘‘hamila'i avasya ksama garine cha.’’ Ra yadi yastai aru sampattiharu pani unako pasama a'umchan bhane tyasala'i pani li'ihalnechan. Ke uniharusita yasa kitabako yo vaca li'eko thi'ena ki allahako barema satya baheka aru kehi nabhanun, ra uniharule yasa kitabama je cha tyasala'i padhisakeka chan. Ra akhiratako ghara uniharukai nimti uttama cha, jo asala kama gardachan, ta ke timi bujhdainaum
